text:
Fisheries (General and Fees) Amendment Regulations 2018

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Living Marine Resources Management Act 1995 .

31 July 2018

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

S. COURTNEY

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Fisheries (General and Fees) Amendment Regulations 2018 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on the day on which their making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Regulations
    In these regulations, the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

4.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 .

6. Legislation rescinded
    The legislation specified in Schedule 1 is rescinded.

SCHEDULE 1 - Legislation rescinded

Regulation 6

Fisheries (Infringement Notices) Regulations 2011 (No. 73 of 2011)  Fisheries (Infringement Notices) Amendment Regulations 2015 (No. 101 of 2015)  Fisheries (Infringement Notices) Amendment Regulations 2016 (No. 31 of 2016)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               


Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 August 2018
